sentences.sContent: Police have defused a bomb found in a downtown building.
sentences.sCn: 警察已拆除了在市中心一幢大楼里发现的一枚炸弹的引信。

synos.tran: 平息；去掉…的雷管；使除去危险性

trans.tranCn: 平息；去掉…的雷管；使除去危险性
trans.tranOther: to improve a difficult or dangerous situation, for example by making people less angry or by dealing with the causes of a problem
